app.title: Barbar Feast 2021 - THREE DAYS OF TRUE ESTONIAN HEAT

content.slogan: Three days of true Estonian heat
content.construction: Please remain patient, we're currently working on this page

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Where does the festival take place?
faq.a1: Barbar Feast 2021 takes place in the exciting Viking Village surrounded by the beautiful nature of Saula village in Kose parish.
faq.a2: While the Viking Village offers all kinds of experiential accommodation all year round, all spots have been filled for now. Nevertheless we welcome you to our camping grounds free of charge (other than the festival pass).
faq.q3: Are we allowed in with our own drinks?
faq.a3: No. You can find tools for quenching your thirst in the festival's market area, where you will find several local brewers in addition to the well-known classics.
faq.q5: Can I pay for stuff with plastic?
faq.a5: Absolutely! Still we advise you to have some cash on you aswell.
faq.a6: As long as it's not against the rules of the Vikings Village, the Constitution of the Republic of Estonia and does not violate or harm the health, property or well-being of the people and animals around you, you can. However, if there is anything crazy on your mind, please let us know well in advance.

location.desc: Where? In the Vikings Village - Kose parish, precisely in the Saula village. We have two stages - one located in the castle, the other right next to the river. In addition to the stages we have a marketplace area for selling merchandise, food and drinks, a lot of different activities and a camping area for additional costs other than the festival's pass itself.

footer.msg: Barbar Feast is brought to you by rock club Barbar!
